source.95aebd04:
import pandas as pd
import numpy as np
import  seaborn as sns
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
from sklearn.datasets import load_breast_cancer
source.ea16e34e:
cancer = load_breast_cancer()
cancer_df = pd.DataFrame(np.c_[cancer['data'], cancer["target"]], columns=np.append(cancer["feature_names"],'target'))
cancer_df
source.2d224a7e: sns.pairplot(cancer_df, hue='target', vars = ['mean radius','mean texture', 'mean area', 'mean perimeter','mean smoothness'])
source.1ac0b3b9: sns.scatterplot(x = 'mean area', y = 'mean smoothness',hue ='target', data = cancer_df)
source.fc3c3b45:
X = cancer_df.drop(['target'], axis=1)
y = cancer_df['target']
from sklearn.model_selection  import train_test_split
X_train,X_test,y_train,y_test = train_test_split(X,y,test_size=0.25)
from sklearn.svm import SVC
from sklearn.metrics import classification_report,confusion_matrix
svc_model = SVC()
svc_model.fit(X_train,y_train)
